panels.content:
The table below provides a map to available detail views depending on your area of interest:

Dashboard Name Description When to Use
Solidfire Cluster Efficiency factors, IOPS, throughput, utilization, active sessions, client queue depth and drives Overview of the Cluster status and its performances
Solidfire Nodes Nodes CPU and memory utilization, Nodes mgmt and storage ports throughput, Nodes drives status and type Analyze nodes performances and address network utilization
Solidfire Volume Top FlexVols with throughput, IOP, and latency; Volume views Detailed overview of each volume per account including: Size, efficiency factors, latency, queue depth, throughput and IOPS
Solidfire Volume TopN Most utilized volumes in terms of IOPS, throughput and latency Analyze for busiest volumes
panels.title: Solidfire Dashboard Map
